pages.text: læa rea di prathan khrxbkhraw khxng khea hı kæ khea læa chen deiyw kab phwk khea phrxm phwk khea pen khwam metta cak rea læa pen khx teuxnsti dæ pwng phu mi sti thanghlay
læa cng xea sesʹ mi sak ka hnung læw fad dwy man læa xya thxn kha saban thæcring rea phb wa khea (xay yub) pen phu xdthn baw phu praserith thæcring khea han hna khea su rea semx
læa cng raluk thung pwng baw khxng rea xi brxhim xis hak læa yaxˌ kub phu thi khemkhæng læa sayta kil (nı reuxng sasna)
rea di leuxk phwk khea doy chephaa pheux teuxn hı raluk thung prlok
læa thæcring phwk khea nan nı thasna khxng rea nænxn xyu nı hmu phu di rab leuxk pheraa phwk khea pen khn di
læa cng raluk thung xis ma xil læa xal ya saxˌ læa salkif li læa thuk khn xyu nı hmu phudi leis
ni khux khx takteuxn læa thæcring sahrab brrda phu yakerng nan nænxn thang klab (khxng phwk khea) yxm praserith thæ
khux swn swrrkh hlakhlay xan sthaphr pratu (thuk ban) ca peid xa wi sahrab txnrab phwk khea
nxn xekkhenk xyu nı swn swrrkh phwk khea ca reiyk xea phl mi læa kheruxng dum nana chnid
læa n thi phwk khea nan mi hying brisuththi phu ld sayta lng ta mixayu runrawkhrawdeiywkan
ni khux sing thi phwk cea thuk sayya wi sahrab wan hæng kar chara baychi
thæcring ni khux paccay yangchiph khxng rea xyang nænxn man ca mimi wan hmd sin
dangnan læa thæcring sahrab brrda phu lameid nan nænxn thang klab (khxng phwk khea) yxm lew cring «
khux nrk yahannam phwk khea ca kheapi phea him nı man dangnan man pen thi phanak thi chawcha ying
Ni (khux kar lngthosʹ xan cebsæb) dangnan phwk cea cng lim rs man (khux) na deuxd phlan læa na leuxd na hnxng (khxng chaw nrk)
læa (kar lngthosʹ) chnid xun xik yeiyng kar lngthosʹ dang klaw thi theatheiym khukhwr kan
ni khux fung chn wing kru kan pi phrxm kab phwk cea mimi kar txnrab phwk khea dxk thæcring phwk khea ca kheapi xyu nı fi nrk
phwk khea klaw wa tæwa phwk than tanghak mimi kar txnrab phwk than pheraa phwk than di teriymtaw wi sahrab rea dangnan man pen thiphak xan chawcha
phwk khea klaw wa kha tæ phracea khxng rea phu dı thi di teriym kar lngthosʹ ni wi hı kæ rea khx phraxngkh di thrng pord pheim kar lngthosʹ kæ khea pen sxng thea nı fi nrk
